title: HMS Service – A Hotel Booking System
description:
• Designed and developed a scalable hotel booking system using Java microservices and Spring Boot.
• Implemented rating, hotel, and user services with MySQL and MongoDB for efficient data management.
• Ensured high availability with Config Server, Eureka client, and Resilience4j for fault tolerance.
• Built a responsive React.js frontend integrated with REST APIs for seamless user interactions.

title: Eshop – An E-commerce Application
description:
• Developed a full-stack e-commerce platform enabling browsing, cart management, and secure order placement.
• Engineered the backend using Spring Boot and MySQL to manage products, orders, and user data efficiently.
• Integrated Auth0 for authentication and enhanced security for transactions.
• Designed a responsive UI using React.js and Bootstrap, ensuring seamless usability across devices.

title: Student Profile Portal
description:
• Built a student profile management system using Django with SQLite for structured data storage.
• Designed and optimized database schemas to improve query performance and data retrieval.
• Developed backend logic for handling student records, profiles, and authentication.
• Created a responsive frontend using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, improving usability.
